VideoOverlay.setBounds

Function/Meaning
Specifies the position and size of the playback rectangle
Type
Method of the VideoOverlay class
Syntax
setBounds(left, top, width, height)
Arguments
left Specifies the left position of the rectangular area for media playback.
top Specifies the top position of the rectangular area for media playback.
width Specifies the width of the rectangular area for media playback.
height Specifies the height of the rectangular area for media playback.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Specifies the position and size of the rectangular area for media playback.
Coordinates are specified in pixels within the window's client area (the area where layers can be displayed).
In the current version, when playing back on a layer, only the position can be specified with this method; the size is ignored.
